requirements.summary: Create homepage hero section showcasing laser cutting artworks with clear messaging about specialization and call-to-action
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays compelling visual of laser cutting artworks
Clear messaging about specialization in gifts, home décor, and industrial applications
Call-to-action buttons for exploring products or contacting business

file_operations.description: Create homepage with hero section using the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png. Include headline emphasizing creativity and precision in laser cutting, subheading highlighting gifting, home décor, and industrial solutions, and CTA buttons linking to product gallery and contact form. Use warm, sophisticated color palette and clean typography.
Add route for HomePage at path '/' to make it the landing page. Register the route in the router configuration and ensure it's accessible without authentication.

requirements.summary: Build product gallery showcasing three main categories: customized gifts, elegant decorative pieces, and accurate industrial components
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery organized into three distinct categories
Each category displays representative product examples
Products show high-quality images with descriptions
Navigation between categories is intuitive

file_operations.description: Implement product gallery with three category tabs: Customized Gifts, Decorative Pieces, and Industrial Components. For Customized Gifts, display frontend/public/assets/generated/gift-showcase.dim_800x600.png with descriptions of personalized wooden plaques and decorative frames. For Decorative Pieces, display frontend/public/assets/generated/decor-showcase.dim_800x600.png featuring geometric wall art and ornamental designs. For Industrial Components, display frontend/public/assets/generated/industrial-showcase.dim_800x600.png showing mechanical parts and technical applications. Use grid layout with smooth category switching.

Create reusable product card component that displays product image, title, description, and category badge. Include hover effects and responsive design following the warm, sophisticated color palette.
Add route for GalleryPage at path '/gallery'. Add navigation link in AppHeader to the gallery page.

requirements.summary: Create About section highlighting innovative ideas, advanced laser technology, focus on originality, durability, and flawless finishing, with emphasis on serving the Pune market
acceptanceCriteria: About section describes innovative design approach and laser technology
Highlights key values: originality, durability, flawless finishing
Mentions Pune market presence
Professional presentation of company philosophy

file_operations.description: Create About page featuring company story and philosophy. Include section on innovative ideas and advanced laser technology using frontend/public/assets/generated/laser-process.dim_1200x800.png to visualize the cutting process. Add section highlighting key values: originality, durability, and flawless finishing. Include company mission statement emphasizing service to the Pune market with contemporary designs. Display frontend/public/assets/generated/workshop-photo.dim_1200x800.png showing the laser cutting equipment and workspace. Use professional layout with clear section divisions.
Add route for AboutPage at path '/about'. Add navigation link in AppHeader to the about page.

requirements.summary: Implement contact form for inquiries about custom orders, quotes, and general questions
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form accepts name, email, phone, and message
Form validates required fields
Backend stores inquiry submissions
Success confirmation shown after submission

file_operations.description: Update existing contact form to include phone number field alongside name, email, and message. Ensure form validation for all required fields. Add submission handler using existing useSubmitContactInquiry hook from useQueries.ts. Display success message after submission and clear form. Style consistently with warm color palette and clean typography.
Verify ContactPage route at '/contact' exists and add navigation link in AppHeader if not already present.

requirements.summary: Create services overview section detailing offerings for gifting solutions, home décor products, and industrial applications
acceptanceCriteria: Three service categories clearly defined
Each category includes description and benefits
Visual representation for each service area
Links or navigation to relevant product examples

file_operations.description: Create Services page with three main service sections. Gifting Solutions section describes personalized gifts, custom designs, and special occasions, linking to relevant gallery category. Home Décor section highlights wall art, decorative pieces, and interior design applications, linking to décor gallery. Industrial Applications section details precision components, technical parts, and commercial solutions, linking to industrial gallery. Use card-based layout with icons or representative images for each category. Include benefits and use cases for each service area.
Add route for ServicesPage at path '/services'. Add navigation link in AppHeader to the services page.

requirements.summary: Design creative, modern visual theme with warm, sophisticated colors conveying craftsmanship and precision using clean typography and spacious layouts
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette reflects craftsmanship and modern design
Typography is clean and professional
Layout emphasizes product imagery and detail
Consistent visual style across all pages
Design conveys precision and quality

file_operations.description: Update global CSS with warm, sophisticated color palette using earthy tones, copper, bronze, and wood-inspired colors. Define custom CSS variables for primary (warm amber/copper), secondary (deep brown), accent (bronze/gold), and neutral colors. Set up typography scale using clean, modern sans-serif fonts. Add base styles for consistent spacing, smooth transitions, and elevated shadows that emphasize craftsmanship.

Extend Tailwind theme with custom color palette matching the warm, sophisticated design: primary colors in amber/copper range, secondary in brown tones, accent in bronze/gold. Configure custom font families for headings and body text. Add custom spacing scale for spacious layouts. Define shadow utilities that convey depth and quality.

Update header styling to match warm, sophisticated theme. Apply custom colors, clean typography, and ensure navigation is clear and accessible. Add subtle hover effects and maintain consistent branding across viewport sizes.
Update footer styling to match the warm color palette and clean typography. Ensure footer complements the overall design language and provides clear contact information and social links.

requirements.summary: Render generated product showcase images as static assets
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated
Images display correctly in gallery and showcase sections
Proper image optimization and loading

file_operations.description: Ensure hero section references frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png with proper loading attributes and responsive sizing. Verify image path is correct and add alt text describing laser cutting artwork.

Verify all generated showcase images are properly referenced: frontend/public/assets/generated/gift-showcase.dim_800x600.png for gifts category, frontend/public/assets/generated/decor-showcase.dim_800x600.png for decorative pieces, and frontend/public/assets/generated/industrial-showcase.dim_800x600.png for industrial components. Add loading='lazy' for performance and descriptive alt text for each image.

Ensure frontend/public/assets/generated/laser-process.dim_1200x800.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/workshop-photo.dim_1200x800.png are properly referenced with correct paths, lazy loading, and descriptive alt text. Apply consistent image styling with the warm color theme.
